name: Lovers Defence
description:
Ludum Dare 50 Entry

An Evil Witch has decided to attack your home! You're not sure why, but you suspect there is some other reason behind it. Build Towers to defeat her minions, and defend your home!

Controls

Q-W-E-R-T-Y - Select Tower Type. 

Arrow Keys - Position Tower

Space Bar - Confirm

Writing and Design - Neptune Programming - Wexyfox & Fydar Art - ToHeckArt Music and Sound - Vichamilton  Level Design - GamerGhoul
